title: Enterprise Program & Relationship Manager - Apple Vision Pro
summary: Apple Vision Pro is a revolutionary spatial computer that seamlessly blends digital content with physical space. Looking for a strategic, technical lead to drive enterprise strategy.
description: We are looking for a savvy individual to drive spatial computing projects in the professional sector. This individual will play an integral role in both the developer and deployment story and should have a passion to shape the future of spatial computing in the workplace.
key_qualifications: 5+ years of experience in the Enterprise space, with a deep understanding of industry trends and emerging technologies. Partnership management experience at an executive level with large Fortune 500 companies.
preferred_qualifications: Hands-on experience building technology for head-mounted devices and interest in spatial computing. Strategic vision and ability to formulate a clear product strategy and roadmap aligned with business goals.
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package. The base pay range for this role is between $175,800 and $312,200. Apple employees also have the opportunity to become an Apple shareholder through participation in Apple’s stock programs.
